steps.title: Always begin by building a power plant.
steps.content: Always begin by building a power plant.

steps.title: Bring power lines a good distance from the power plant.
steps.content: Bring power lines a good distance from the power plant.

steps.title: Add in some roads, creating a good infrastructure with boxes that you can zone in later.
steps.content: Add in some roads, creating a good infrastructure with boxes that you can zone in later.

steps.title: Zone in these boxes.
steps.content: Zone in these boxes. Always have more Residential and Industrial zones than Commercial zones.

steps.title: Add in one school, a college, a police station, and a fire station.
steps.content: Add in one school, a college, a police station, and a fire station. Throw in a jail because if the police have no place to put criminals, they will be forced to let them go.

steps.title: Put water towers and pumping stations around your town.
steps.content: Put water towers and pumping stations around your town. Then connect pipes to them and build an efficient water system with pipes all around the town.

steps.title: Open up your budget.
steps.content: Open up your budget. Raise the funding for all departments and raise the taxes to 8%. (Sims actually like this tax at first. As your city grows, the tax rate they are happy with becomes ridiculously small.)

steps.title: Once all this is completed, press the green triangle and you are off!
steps.content: Once all this is completed, press the green triangle and you are off!
